author: Adi Robertson
title: Meta reportedly canceled a 300-person VR / AR operating system project
description: Meta, formerly known as Facebook, has reportedly canceled a VR / AR operating system known as XROS after the departure of project head Mark Lucovsky.

title: Vergecast: Wordle’s App Store clones, FTC’s Meta lawsuit moves forward, and PC’s big year
description: This week’s Vergecast covers the success and inevitable competition of puzzle game Wordle, what happens next with the FTC’s Meta lawsuit, and this week’s gadget news.

author: Russell Brandom
title: Facebook contractors threaten to stop work over missing paychecks
description: Contractors at an Accenture site in Austin that handles moderation and other services for Meta and WhatsApp are still waiting for their holiday paychecks and threatening to stop work as a result.

title: Meta doubles down on Oculus Quest name change and everyone hates it
description:
Just stick to what we know and love.

What you need to know


Meta changes the social media account of its VR brand from Oculus to Meta Quest.
The change follows Meta's company rebrand that was announced in late 2021.
No one liked it then, no one likes it now…
